form.label: 4. üîç Results analysis (Advanced monitoring)
form.description: This dashboard is used to analyze results between and original job and its healthcheck job

search.query: | loadjob $sid_results$ | eventstats values(result_sha256) as results_sha256 by sid | eval signature = sha256(mvjoin(results_sha256,",")) | stats dc(signature) as dc_signature, dc(sid) as dc_sid | eval text = case(dc_sid==1,"Not all results data are available for comparison",dc_signature==0,"Advanced monitoring is not enabled or not yet executed",dc_signature==1,"‚úÖ Results are the same",1==1,"‚ùå Results are different") | table text

panel.title: üîç Original job results details executed at '$time_origin_readable$':

table.title: 1Ô∏è‚É£ This is the results for the original job

search.query: | loadjob $sid_results$ | search sid="$sid_origin$" | table result.* | rename result.* as *

panel.title: üîç Healthcheck job results details executed at '$time_healthcheck_readable$':

table.title: 2Ô∏è‚É£ This is the results for the healthcheck job

search.query: | loadjob $sid_results$ | search sid="$sid_healthcheck$" | table result.* | rename result.* as *

panel.title: üî• Results different between the two jobs

table.title: This indicates the results that aren't present in both jobs but only in one of them

search.query: | loadjob $sid_results$ | eventstats count as count_result_sha256 by result_sha256 | where count_result_sha256!=2 | fields - result_sha256 count_result_sha256 | table sid * | rename result.* as *

(sourcetype=detection_backfill:events type=healthcheck:job_dispatched uid=$uid$) OR (index=_audit sourcetype=audittrail `filter_audittrail_logs` action=search info!="granted" [search sourcetype=detection_backfill:events type=healthcheck:job_dispatched uid=$uid$ | rename "jobs.healthcheck.sid" as search_id | eval search_id = "'"+search_id+"'" | table search_id]) | eventstats max(_time) as time_healthcheck | search sourcetype="detection_backfill:events" | rename "jobs.origin.sid" as sid_origin, "jobs.healthcheck.sid" as sid_healthcheck, "jobs.origin.timestamp" as time_origin, _time as time_healthcheck | table sid_origin, sid_healthcheck, time_origin, time_healthcheck | eval min_time = relative_time(time_origin,"-5min@min"), max_time = relative_time(time_healthcheck,"+6h@h")

panel.title: [Debug] Get results from SIDs and timerange

search.query: (sourcetype=detection_backfill:events type=healthcheck:job_result) sid IN ("$sid_origin$","$sid_healthcheck$") | table result.* sid result_sha256
